src.sql:
declare @projectId INT = '[TknParams:projectId]'

select
P.Id,
P.Title,
P.Description,
FORMAT (P.CreatedDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as CreatedDate,
U.DisplayName as CreatedBy,
FORMAT (P.LastModifiedDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as LastModifiedDate,
UU.DisplayName as LastModifiedBy
from app.Project P
left JOIN app.ProjectProjectChangeChanges PPCC ON P.Id = PPCC.ProjectId
left join dbo.Users U on U.UserId = P.CreatedBy
left join dbo.Users UU on UU.UserId = P.LastModifiedBy
WHERE P.Id = @projectId
Group By
P.Id,
P.Title,
P.Description,
P.CreatedDate,
P.LastModifiedDate,
U.DisplayName,
UU.DisplayName
src.columns:
Id
Title
Description
CreatedDate
LastModifiedDate
DisplayName
CreatedBy
LastModifiedBy
